area_name: Miles of Piles Rock - East Face

climbs.name: Rat Boy
climbs.fa: Dave Evans and Alan Bartlett, April 1988

content.description: A hand jam traverse down low and a finger to hand crack at the top are fun.  However, there is a gritty, loose flake at midheight, and this is not a climb to put on your target list.
content.location: This climb starts at the same place as Cruelty To Animals, but moves up and right along a slanting crack system.  It then moves up and left to finish near the top of Cruelty To Animals.

climbs.name: Cruelty To Animals
climbs.fa: Alan Bartlett, Dave Evans, and Pat Nay, April 1988

content.description: This is a nice, sustained hand crack.  It ends on a large ledge below the summit.
content.location: This straight-in crack is at the left end of the face.

climbs.name: Cripple Crack
climbs.fa: Alan Roberts, Tony Puppo, and Alan Bartlett, March 1988

content.description: The crux is a 12' long, overhanging crack on a smooth wall on the first pitch.  Belay on a large ledge.  The second pitch (5.9) is a nice overhang and lieback/hand crack.
content.location: This route follows a crack system on the center of the east face.

pathTokens: Miles of Piles Rock - East Face
